Text:
Thanks again Albiondean

I have noticed that today you used mp4 format - will this be the new normal - instead of avi files??

positives:  superior picture, smaller file.

negatives:  more demanding of a cpu, and not playable on a DIVX disc for a DVD player.

Just Saying.

Thank you very much Dean.

As long as they're not mkv files.
I'm not bothered what format i do, just thought I'd do mp4 for a change to see if you guys like it.

Thank you AD :) 
For anyone wanting to convert to AVI, Freemake Video Converter is great, I had problems with MP4 and Matroska files until one of the uploaders on Pirate Bay pointed me in the right direction :)
Thanks so much for the switch to mp4!! Better quality and it's great not having to convert in order to watch through Apple TV. :-)
This wouldnt play on my apple tv 1st gen... but the AVI's used to. =o(
love the MP4 format. Please keeping them coming
Please avi format.  MP4 doesnt play well on ibook G4.  thank you albiondean.  up to date with Corrie thanks yo you.  Canada 2 weeks behind.
New format was great, better picture, we use apple mac and no problems at all playing it. Looked fantastic on our 3 metre screen! Thanks Dean.
